Job Description

Regional Marketing Home Office partners with Regional Marketing Field teams to support the development, implementation, and measurement of local marketing programs.

A reporting and analytics consultant helps inform business decisions through measurement frameworks, insights analysis and field integration. While primarily supporting the field, their work intersects with various areas of Home Office including Marketing Program Delivery, MARA, D3 & Finance. Applies technical knowledge to query databases, manipulate data and leverage business intelligence tools. Act a liaison and coach for field resources in leveraging analytics.

Key Responsibilities
  • Create queries and automate delivery of key data sets
  • Build program level measurement to analyze results by region, territory, market and agent
  • Leverage technology to build scalable program measurement by region, territory, market and agent
  • Proactively analyze marketing program results and provide recommendations
  • Determine field measurement needs as it relates to marketing programs and business results.
  • Contribute to strategic decision-making regarding budget allocations and marketing program spend
  • Understand and effectively use business intelligence tools
  • Ability to project plan and manage multiple workstreams
  • Willingness and ability to learn new analytical programs
Job Qualifications
  • 3+ years of related experience
  • Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel and Access
  • Intermediate proficiency in Business Objects and Tableau
  • Intermediate SQL query creation a plus
  • Advanced organization and project/program management skills
  • Advanced communication and collaboration skills
  • Intermediate presentation development, delivery and meeting facilitation skills
  • Intermediate leadership skills - learning agility & ability to think critically required
  • Ability to align program results with regional marketing strategy
  • Bachelor s degree preferred
  • Industry knowledge a plus
  • Field experience a plus

The candidate(s) offered this position will be required to submit to a background investigation, which includes a drug screen.
